name: Brick Breaker Robots
description:
Brick Breaker Robots is an arcade game for Windows and Android platforms which the player utilizes a robot to bounce a ball off its 2D body and clear out blocks in the form of space cogs, palmtrees, sailingships that spawn sharks while the lazer tubes respond to the player's movements. Octavus Prime gives the player two moons and when they run out...Game Over!  The player control's the robot's movements along the horizontal axis on Windows using 'A and D' keys or arrow keys, on Android by either tilting their device or touching  the screen of their  tablet or phone.
Feel your fingers glide across the screen.  Imagine a world made of blocks in the shape of floating palm trees, space cogs and robots. Guide your robot to clear as many blocks as you can.
THE STORY
Drifting into deep space they fast banded together making a spacecraft out of any spare parts they could find. Tensegrity ... tensegrity.  They landed on a suitable planet, built cities, sailing ships from blocks that can spawn sharks and meta horticulture that makes palm trees float above the land.  Amid the crowd a few robots escape on a motorized surfboard to a faraway island...Find...our lost tribe of robots.
